tg.t: A story is told about him.
s/he tells about s.o., s/he talks about s.o.; s/he narrates about s.o.
They are telling a story about him or them.
s/he tells, s/he tells a story; s/he tells news, s/he gives an account, s/he narrates; s/he tells his/her own story
story, true story, account, report; news; what is being told
s/he hangs, s/he is hanging, s/he is suspended
He is on the look-out for it.
s/he waits and watches for s.t.; s/he looks out for s.t.
Be on the look-out for him.
Someone is on the look-out for him.
He is on the look-out for him.
s/he looks out for s.o., s/he waits and watches for s.o., s/he lies in watch for s.o.
A place designated as a look-out. E.g. A watchtower.
hunting-blind; a place to watch from; look-out, lighthouse, watchtower; looking out
A blind that is used by hunters, usually man-made, from trees shrubs or a hill, to watch for the enemy.
hunting-blind; a place to watch from; look-out, lighthouse, watchtower; looking out
Before that time. Before then and now. [Location]
He shook hands with him or them.
s/he greets s.o., s/he sends greetings to s.o.; s/he says hello to s.o.; s/he shakes hands with s.o.; s/he hugs s.o. in greeting, s/he kisses s.o. in greeting; s/he bids s.o. farewell
They shook hands with all of them.
He clears the way or leaves a trail as he goes.
s/he slashes a path, s/he clears or marks a line, s/he clears the way of trees
He goes and his somebody or something as he is going.
s/he slashes a path, s/he clears or marks a line, s/he clears the way of trees
beyond the rocks; beyond the Rocky Mountains
On the other side (of). E.g. A hill.
beyond the place, beyond the bush
Above, more. Over and above the limit. More and more.
Over further. Also a command, meaning move over.
go on; go away; on, to the further side (in time or space); beyond, further over there
He asks for something to be done which is difficult to do.
clothes; clothing, apparel; [singular:] article of clothing
He is bothered or pestered by people for services.
He is in pursuit of him.
s/he gives chase, s/he chases game; s/he is in pursuit, s/he pursues
He knocks it down (it implies something standing).
He is knocking down (felling) trees. E.g. As a beaver.
He is knocked down (implies he was standing).
He is knocked down by a bit or a biting attacker.
Only now, for the first time.
only now, for the first time, just then
1. He sits higher or farther away. 2. He sits so high.
What is said about him in a story.
What he tells about him in a story.
s/he tells thus about s.o., s/he narrates thus about s.o.
2. He talks intelligently for his age.
He is praying to the Creator.
s/he prays, s/he pleads, s/he chants
s/he looks at s.t., s/he observes s.t.; s/he watches s.t.
s/he looks at s.t., s/he observes s.t.; s/he watches s.t.
Keep looking at him. Keep an eye on him. [Command]
s/he looks at s.o.; s/he looks after s.o.
s/he makes s.o. beautiful, s/he beautifies s.o.
s/he is beautiful, s/he is good-looking
s/he gets chilled, s/he gets cold
s/he is cold, s/he experiences cold, s/he suffers from cold
The state of being cold or chilled.
coldness; of or pertaining to being cold
Chop it down. Flatten it with a machine.
s/he chops s.t. down, s/he fells s.t.
s/he chops s.t. down, s/he fells s.t.
s/he bites s.t. until it falls, s/he eats s.t. until it falls
it gnaws s.o. down (e.g. a beaver to a tree)
s/he gets (it/him) chilled, s/he gets s.t. cold
it clings, it sticks; it is fastened on
You are cold. Usually used in a question. E.g. kikawacin ci? Are you cold?
He is being taught. He is learning. He is going to school.
s/he learns; s/he is a student, s/he attends school; s/he is taught
learning, being a student, attending school; schoolwork, homework
He plays often on a musical instrument.
He tries to make it work.
Try running it (animate). As a car.
He gets carried away in talking.
s/he is careful how s/he speaks to s.o. out of respect; s/he avoids speaking to s.o.
He has respect for him (language wise).
s/he is careful how s/he speaks to s.o. out of respect; s/he avoids speaking to s.o.
What is said of him is bad.
He tells bad news of him.
s/he speaks ill of s.o., s/he tells bad news of s.o.
He is living at the present time.
while s/he lives, s/he is living presently, during his/her lifespan
it is night, it is night time; it is dark
s/he disturbs s.o., s/he annoys s.o. (by speech)
He is annoyed by senseless talk.
He annoys him by senseless talk.
s/he disturbs s.o., s/he annoys s.o. (by speech)
s/he tattle, s/he tells on, s/he reveals the truth
Lots of him is eaten. Animate.
A lunch. Not a full meal.
good luck; welfare; prosperity; good heart
on the bare ground; on the floor; to the ground
on the floor, on the floorboards
All of you eat it. Animate. [Command]
Put him away to store. Store him away. [Command]
s/he puts his/her own head down
s/he nods his/her own head, s/he shakes his/her own head
by comparison; better, more; before; instead, rather, somewhat
s/he roasts s.t., s/he cooks s.t. (i.e. in a wood stove or on a fire)
s/he sits with his/her own head and body bent down
s/he sits with his/her own head down
s/he hangs his/her own head down, s/he bends down his/her own head
s/he bends over, s/he bends down, s/he bends forward; s/he stoops, s/he bends
s/he chooses s.o.; s/he picks s.o. out
s/he chases after s.t., s/he pursues s.t.
s/he chases after s.o., s/he pursues s.o.
it catches on fire, it is reached by flames, it catches fire
s/he grabs s.t., s/he seizes s.t.; s/he catches s.t. in his/her hand
He is caught. E.g. From falling.
s/he grabs s.o., s/he seizes s.o.; s/he catches s.o. in his/her hand (e.g. a ball)
He hold or grasps onto something.
A willow branch used for discipline.
willow branch, willow switch; little willow
Meaning, go and get, go and do or go and act. Also nitawi.
my grandmother; [reference extended to all related females of grandmother's generation]; my respected female elder
the Big Dipper, the Great Bear (constellation)
s/he pulls s.t., s/he pulls s.t. out, towards
s/he pulls s.o., s/he pulls s.o. out, towards; s/he wins from s.o.
He has cramps. He has a seizure.
s/he has a seizure, s/he has fits; s/he has cramps
He has a brother who is a cousin.
he has a brother, he has a male parallel cousin
from there, thence, out of; with, by means of; because of; for; from then; about
it flows thence, it flows from there
s/he sheds tears; s/he has tears dropping
He leaks. Animate. It flows out. As a pail leaking.
1. That's where he scolds from. (A location). 2. He scolds about it.
s/he fights s.o. over something; s/he fights s.o. on account of something
s/he fights s.o. over something; s/he fights s.o. on account of something
it comes from there, it results from that
That's where he comes from, riding.
it moves thence, it rides thence; it come from there
on purpose, purposely, deliberately; it has to be, it is necessary; as expected; without fail; by all means; expressly, specifically
That's where he goes out of.
s/he sits in front of and facing s.t.
s/he sits in front of and facing s.o.
s/he sits in front of and facing s.o.
One who can talk at great length intelligently.
These animate items her. E.g. These cars here. Minosak oki.
A musician. He who plays music.
it is this; the fact that; then; when; as it is, actually
A thresher. One who threshes grain.
thresher, one who threshes grain, one who combines
s/he beats s.t., s/he shakes s.t. out by tool; s/he dusts s.t. off
s/he beats s.o., s/he shakes s.o. out by tool; s/he dusts s.o. off
a quick swelling on a body part.
He goes around telling news of him.
s/he tells about s.o., s/he talks about s.o.; s/he narrates about s.o.
He flees about while getting chased.
s/he beats s.t., s/he shakes s.t. out, s/he brushes s.t. off by tool; s/he threshes s.t.
s/he threshes, s/he threshes grain, s/he combines
s/he brushes s.o. off by tool; s/he threshes s.o. (e.g. grain)
s/he comes in flight, s/he flees here for shelter, s/he flees here for help
s/he blows hither, s/he breathes forth; s/he has his/her breathing return
s/he sees s.t., s/he witnesses s.t.
one; alone, single; the only one
s/he deals only with s.o., s/he deals with s.o. alone
He is the only one at it.
There is more than one at him.
He is the only one at him.
He keeps to one area. He favors doing one thing only.
s/he has one leg, s/he is one-legged
He lives alone. This term also used for when a girl becomes a woman.
s/he dwells alone, s/he lives alone
One of a kind. One type. One select group.
They are one group of them. E.g. Tribe or nation.
they are one tribe, one nation
s/he is alone; s/he is the only one
It is by itself. As a reply, it means "the same", after "tansi?".
same, the same, just the same; similar
In one spot, place or area.
in one place, the same spot
At one place. In one location.
in one place, in a certain place; in the same place; one way, one kind
A meal is cooked for him.
She cooks a meal for him.
s/he cooks for s.o., s/he cooks a meal for s.o.
s/he crawls about, s/he crawls around, s/he creeps
He sweeps it in with an object.
s/he throws s.t. into a hole
s/he throws s.o. into a hole
Usually added to a verb to mean continuous action. [Reduplication]
He sees through it e.g. A microscope.
s/he sees through s.t., s/he takes a x-ray of s.t.
HE earns money. He makes money from it.
s/he earns money, s/he earns wages; s/he makes money, s/he creates money
money; change; [singular:] quarter dollar; a quarter, twenty-five cents
He stands on the top of it.
He jumps on the top of it.
Hit it on target with an object.
s/he hits s.t. with a missile; s/he hits s.t. (as a target), s/he hits the mark; s/he bumps into s.t.
He hits it on target. E.g. with a car.
s/he hits s.t. with a missile; s/he hits s.t. (as a target), s/he hits the mark; s/he bumps into s.t.
s/he shelters s.t. from the wind
A lean to. Anything use for shelter.
s/he makes shelter from the wind
s/he sees s.t., s/he witnesses s.t.
bit of meat, piece of meat
He increases his family. He increases his weight.
s/he grows; s/he has progeny; [plural:] they increase as a family
Starblanket; literally: "One who has Stars as a Blanket"; name of Cree chief, signatory to Treaty 4
it is a star; s/he is a star (e.g. in movies, sports, music, etc.)
s/he hangs with bottom up, it hangs with bottom up
they sit in layers on top of one another
s/he piles s.t. in layers on top of one another
they are piled in layers on top of one another; they are piled up, crosswise; they are laid on top of one another
s/he is verbally abused, s/he is wronged verbally, s/he is slandered, s/he is badmouthed
s/he puts s.o. into water, s/he soaks s.o. in water, s/he immerses s.o. in water
Beaver Hills People; band name, division of the Plains Cree from the area around Fort Edmonton, AB
Edmonton, AB; Fort Edmonton; literally: "Beaver Hills House"
but now, just recently, not long ago
s/he looks around, s/he looks out; s/he waits and watches
s/he crawls back, s/he crawls backwards
Starblanket, prominent Cree chief, signatory to Treaty 6
it is a star; s/he is a star
inside of the body, the insides; entrails, internal organs (of an animal)
begin to, beginning; progressively, proceed to, going on, progressing; on the way
go on; go away; get out of my way
at the other side of the house
it goes round a bend; it goes behind an obstacle to vision, it goes out of sight
s/he runs round behind an obstacle to vision, s/he runs out of sight
s/he throws him/herself to the other side of an obstacle, out of sight
s/he goes around s.t. by canoe
s/he goes behind an obstacle to vision, out of sight; the sun sets
go on; go away; on, to the further side (in time or space); further on, beyond, more
go on; go away; get out of my way
s/he warms up, s/he warms him/herself
family allowance; literally: "child-money, small amount of money or change for a child"
I don't know who; I wonder who
small article of clothing; [plural:] children's clothes; child's clothing, child's apparel
on both banks, on both sides of the river
s/he goes behind a cloud (e.g. the sun or moon)
s/he eats at noon; s/he has lunch
noon meal, lunch, dinner; literally: "mid-day meal"
at a time closer to the present; more recently
there are many blackbirds, blackbirds are abundant
opposite of expected, reversal of the norm; instead
what is this! and so it appears
it was then; well, that's it, (concluding statement)
and then, it was then; then s/he ...
only now, for the first time, just then
that much, to that extent, up to that point; enough; not so, not as; [negative comparative]
about this; this is why, this is the reason for this
now then (hortatory, indicating readiness or impatience)
now then (hortatory, indicating readiness or impatience)
s/he has just so much left
s/he crawls off to one side
s/he asks, s/he asks people; s/he asks for s.t., s/he asks a question of people
it is misty, there is a light drizzle, there is a light rain
s/he fells s.o. by tool or shot
s/he freezes immersed, s/he is wet to prostration
s/he makes s.o. cold, s/he gets s.o. cold, s/he exposes s.o. to cold; s/he freezes s.o. to prostration
it is a long time now
s/he takes his/her own clothes off
large conference, large meeting; religious gathering
s/he is unable to hear, s/he has a blockage of the ear
s/he learns by watching s.t., s/he looks on to learn s.t.
s/he learns from watching s.o., s/he learns from observing s.o.; s/he imitates s.o., s/he uses s.o.'s tactics; s/he watches s.o.'s example
s/he observes, s/he learns by observing
s/he does washing, s/he washes, s/he wipes
s/he plays a little on a musical instrument
s/he plays often on a musical instrument
s/he makes music, s/he plays a musical instrument
s/he tells false tales about s.o.
creature which is cut off at the ear; one-eared person
s/he is cut off at the ear
s/he changes his/her own shape or form
parent-in-law; child-in-law; person to whom speech is avoided
there is a hard crust on snow
it is in a hard lump (as clay)
s/he snores; s/he is heard from a distance while sleeping
but here s/he is, speak of the devil
they stand in a cluster (e.g. plants)
s/he argues with s.o.; s/he questions s.o.
while it is dark, night time
s/he has his/her property look nice, s/he has things look prosperous
s/he eats, s/he has a meal
s/he prepares a meal, s/he prepares meals
lunch, small meal; light meal, snack
s/he notices s.t., s/he catches a glimpse of s.t.
s/he notices s.o., s/he catches a glimpse of s.o.
on the floor; on the floorboards
s/he digs for gold or silver; s/he prospects
s/he is like a White-Man, s/he acts like a White-Man
a White-Man, the Whites; little White-Man; Canadian
s/he says the White word, s/he says the English word
he is a White-Man, s/he is White
s/he wears s.o. out by speech; s/he tells all when relating about s.o.
not so, not as much, not that much
not so, not as much, not that much
s/he bows to s.o. (with the head only like a nod); s/he bows his/her own head to s.o.
s/he looks for s.t., s/he search for s.t.; s/he looks out for s.t.
s/he looks around for s.o., s/he searches for s.o.; s/he looks out for s.o.
s/he escorts s.o., s/he accompanies s.o. a ways as that one departs
s/he goes to take a look at s.t.
sort of, kind of, approximately; more or less; even a little
s/he cooks (it/him) for s.o., s/he roasts (it/him) for s.o.
s/he cooks (it/him) for him/herself, s/he roasts (it/him) for him/herself
s/he makes a roast of s.o., s/he roasts s.o. (e.g. rabbit)
s/he runs with his/her own body bent
s/he ducks his/her own head, s/he bends down quickly
s/he makes his/her choice by sight
s/he chooses (it/him) for s.o.; s/he makes a choice for s.o.
s/he chases after a person, people; s/he pursues a person, people
s/he gives chase, s/he chases game; s/he is in pursuit, s/he pursues
s/he hits s.t. in mid-air, as it flies by
s/he hits s.o. in mid-air, as it flies by
s/he takes hold of (it/him) for s.o.
s/he is tired, s/he is out of breath
s/he looks around for s.o., s/he searches for s.o.
s/he goes to see s.t., s/he fetches s.t.
s/he goes to see s.o., s/he fetches s.o.
s/he fetches money (e.g. get treaty money)
writing in Cree, translation into Cree
s/he writes s.t. in Cree, s/he translates s.t. into Cree
s/he learns Cree, Cree ways; s/he attends Cree school
s/he has a good appetite; s/he is a habitual eater
s/he canoes to the open water; s/he canoes to the prairie, open country
s/he goes out to sea; s/he goes out into the lake
it is Wednesday; literally: "(it is) the third day"
s/he is away from home for three nights
they sleep three in a bed
they travel in a family of three
three-legged being (e.g. a dog who has lost a leg)
it has three legs, it is three-legged
it has three legs (as a stool)
s/he shoots three of them with one shot
s/he sniffs at things for food
s/he goes for horses or dogs; s/he looks for his/her own horses or dogs
s/he goes to see s.t., s/he tries to see s.t.
s/he goes and sees s.o., s/he tries to see s.o., s/he goes to visit s.o.
s/he looks, s/he takes a look
go and, go to; engaged in
s/he borrows, s/he seeks to borrow
he leads a war-party, he conducts a war-party; he arranges a raid
go ahead, go on, be off!
for the future, in the future
go ahead, go on, be off!
it is Friday; literally: "(it is )the fifth day"
it is a point of land
next summer; in the (coming) summer, when it's summer
stone boat; wagon; perhaps literally: "summer sled"
my deceased grandmother, my late grandmother
my uncle, my parallel uncle; my father's brother, my mother's sister's husband
s/he is hungry; s/he wants to eat, s/he would like to eat
for awhile, for quite a while
for awhile, for quite a while
it is pulled, it is pulled out
s/he stops s.o., s/he holds s.o. away
s/he runs at the nose, s/he has a runny nose
it drips, it flows from there; it leaks
s/he suffers in retribution for something
s/he moves s.o.'s household from there, s/he helps s.o. move from somewhere
s/he leaves tracks from there, s/he leaves a trail from there
s/he wins from, over s.o. (with things)
s/he wins from, over people (with things); s/he scores a win
s/he is from there, s/he comes from there; s/he exists thence, therefore
s/he sits facing; s/he sits in front (facing an audience)
s/he has (s.o. as) an older sister
s/he has a threshing machine, s/he has a combine
it contains gold; it is made of gold
s/he eats supper, s/he eats an evening meal
s/he gives s.t. a ride; s/he pulls s.t.
right here, in this place; like this
this much, to this degree, to this extent, this far
s/he blinks, s/he closes his/her eyes
s/he bumps s.t. with his/her body
s/he bumps s.o. with his/her body
s/he lets his/her breath out, s/he breathes his/her last
s/he cooks, s/he prepares a meal
s/he looks after his/her child, s/he takes care of children
s/he misses s.o. (when trying to bite him)
s/he beats the tent walls or the house
s/he beats s.t., s/he shakes s.t. out by tool; s/he dusts s.t. (with a brush)
s/he knocks things clean, s/he beats things clean; s/he dusts (e.g. furniture)
each individually, one each; singly, one at a time, one by one
s/he dries his/her eyes, s/he has dry eyes
come and; towards, approaching; hither; thence, from there on down; [towards focus]
s/he comes up through breathing hole
s/he sees s.t. at close range, nearby
s/he sees s.o. at close range, nearby
s/he comes with news of s.o.; s/he tells news of s.o. coming
it is Monday; literally: "(it is) the first day"
s/he has only one weapon, s/he took only one weapon along
s/he lives in a lone lodge
s/he brings s.t. as the only thing
playing card; ace; [plural:] cards, deck of cards, game of cards
s/he lies down alone; s/he hides
enough for one pair of leggings
a single one (e.g. stocking); [when plural: pêyakw-âyak]: a single pair
cart pulled by a single horse
s/he is alone; s/he sits, stays alone at home
it is for one shot, it is single-barreled
it stands as one blade or stem
once upon a time, one time
it is a single piece (i.e. cloth)
s/he thinks only of him/herself, s/he is selfish, s/he is self-centered
s/he cooks, s/he does the cooking
it is a crosswise road, it lies crosswise
it is a foot path or trail
s/he makes a fold in his/her garment
s/he sticks his/her arm into a hole
it goes into a hole, it falls into a hole
s/he dresses s.o., s/he makes s.o. put clothes on; s/he clothes s.o., s/he makes clothes for s.o.
s/he dresses him/herself, s/he clothes him/herself, s/he makes clothes for him/herself
s/he puts his/her own clothing on, s/he gets dressed
s/he stops eating, s/he is finished eating
s/he is disobedient, s/he refuses to listen
s/he sees through s.o.; s/he takes s.o.'s x-ray
it is underneath, it runs beneath
s/he carries things in his/her own belt
s/he flees and hides under something
s/he makes money out of s.t.
s/he earns money from s.t., s/he makes money at s.t., s/he uses s.t. to make money
s/he earns money using s.o., s/he makes money from s.o. (e.g. bannock)
it is Treaty Day; there is an abundance of money
it is worth money; it consists of money
it is or has gold or money
s/he stands on the top of something
s/he throws him/herself up on top; s/he jumps on the top of something
s/he lies on the top of something
forked pole for holding things up
s/he puts up his/her own tent pole
web, webbed membrane, webbing of web-footed waterbirds
s/he slashes s.t. open (as a path), s/he clears or marks s.t. (as a line)
s/he slashes a path, s/he clears or marks a line, s/he clears the way of trees
s/he hews a road through the woods
s/he makes room for s.o. to sit; s/he gives s.o. a place to sit
s/he grows leaving a passage (e.g. plants)
it lies leaving a passage through
s/he blazes a trail, s/he slashes a path; s/he makes room by tool
s/he leaves a passage, s/he makes room
I don't know; I wonder how, I wonder what
how long, from what point in time
s/he has pain in his/her own ears
s/he makes a shelter from the wind over (it/him) for s.o.
s/he says the wrong thing; s/he loses his/her own train of thought while speaking
s/he sees (it/him) on or for s.o.
s/he sees s.o., s/he witnesses s.o.
[generally in negative phrases:] s/he is blind
s/he has flashing eyes; s/he has grey eyes
s/he has someone as a dinner companion; s/he eats with s.o.
s/he originates (temporally) together with s.o.; s/he is born together with s.o.
dirty clothing, dirty article of clothing
dirty clothing, dirty article of clothing
increase of family, increase of population
it is an area of sandhills
s/he crawls off to one side
it is foggy, it is cloudy, it is rainy
there is a fog rolling in, there is a sudden fog
